template <unsigned int Align>
struct vsip::impl::Stride_unit_align
File: ../../../vsip/core/layout.hpp

Stride_unit_align indicates that at compile-time, minor dimension is known to be unit-stride and major dimensions are known to start on aligned boundaries.
